metadata.title: CVE-2019-6781 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An Improper Input Validation issue was discovered in GitLab Community andEnterprise Edition before 11.5.8, 11.6.x before 11.6.6, and 11.7.x before11.7.1. It was possible to use the profile name to inject a potentiallymalicious link into notification emails.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
